docs.title: Hi, I'm Seth Palkki 👋
docs.text: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm an electrical engineer with hands-on experience in power systems, software coding, and data integration. This site houses my resume, a curated list of projects, and links to my social media pages.

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• 🎓 BSE Electrical Engineering (Magna Cum Laude)
    • ⚡Concentration in Electrical Power & Energy Systems
  • 🎓 MSE Electrical Engineering Student (projected to graduate May 2026)
    • ⚡ Focus in Mixed Signal Circuit Design
  • 🔣 Software Languages
    • Python (Flask/RESTful API)
    • mySQL
    • Java
    • Dart (Flutter mobile app)
    • Relay Ladder Logic (RLL)
    • Arduino

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:

docs.title: Resume
docs.text:
• Download a copy of my resume here (PDF)

You can also view my resume in a preview below:

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• GridScout — Mobile front end + RESTful API backend system for utility grid mapping and AWS S3 updates. Python, Flutter (Dart), Flask, MySQL, AWS S3, OpenDSS.
  • Hot Dog Vending Machine — Industrial assembly line style design project utilizing an Allen-Bradley MicroLogix 1000 series controller. Relay Ladder Logic (RLL), Low Voltage Wiring.
  • Project Sprout — Drone swarm concept project where five different robots work cohesively to aid farmers with crop planting and maintenance to reduce greenhous gas emmission from farms and assist in the national farming labor shortage. Arduino, AutoCAD.

docs.title: Grid Scout
docs.text: Stack: Python, Flask, MySQL, Dart via Flutter Role: Full Stack Developer with emphasis on the back-end Dates: 2024–2025 Repo:
